content.html:
How to Be Less Harsh with Yourself (and Others): Ram Dass on the Spiritual Lessons of Trees.

.. and great lessons they are ‚Ä¶

‚ÄúWhen you go out into the woods and you look at trees, you see all these different trees. And some of them are bent, and some of them are straight, and some of them are evergreens, and some of them are whatever. And you look at the tree and you allow it. You see why it is the way it is.‚Äù

‚ÄúThe minute you get near humans, you lose all that. And you are constantly saying, ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre too this, or I‚Äôm too this.‚Äù That judging mind comes in. And so I practice turning people into trees. Which means appreciating them just the way they are.

via the inimitable Maria Popova
content.value:

‚ÄúThe minute you get near humans, you lose all that. And you are constantly saying, ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre too this, or I‚Äôm too this.‚Äù That judging mind comes in. And so I practice turning people into trees. Which means appreciating them just the way they are.

content.html:
AirPlay Not Working with HomePod Mini? Try This Stupid Trick

‚ÄúUnplug the HomePod Mini from the wall or outlet, then plug it back into the power source.‚Äù

The fact that this fixes the problem is one thing. The fact that it constitutes advice - a totally different thing.

Surely ‚ÄúSwitch it off - switch it on again‚Äù has been the staple of all tech support for several decades.

Who in the OSXDaily readership needs to be told to try this?

OK OK - yes - SEO!
content.value:
